text: Albert Pahimi Padacké (, born 15 November 1966) is a Chadian politician. He was the last Prime Minister of Chad from 2016 to 2018. However in 2021, the job was created again with interim leader Mahamat Déby making him prime minister again. He was prime minister until October 2022. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Prime ministers of Chad Category:Living people
title: Albert Pahimi Padacké
